title: The White House Announces Updated Presidential Delegation to Switzerland to attend the World Economic Forum â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
January 15, 2019
President Donald J. Trump today announced the Presidential Delegation that will attend the World Economic Forum in Davos-Klosters, Switzerland, from January 22 to January 25, 2019.The Honorable Steven Mnuchin, Secretary of the Treasury, will lead the delegation.Other Members of the Presidential Delegation:The Honorable Mike Pompeo, Secretary of StateThe Honorable Wilbur Ross, Secretary of CommerceThe Honorable Robert Lighthizer, United States Trade RepresentativeThe Honorable Chris Liddell, Assistant to the President and Deputy Chief of Staff for Policy Coordination
